title: Interactive Aquarium
description: A fully interactive aquarium simulation with fish, feeding, bubbles, swaying grass, and light rays built using HTML, CSS, and React.
features: Add up to 20 unique fish with different colors and patterns
Feed fish by clicking anywhere or using the Feed button
Realistic fish movement with velocity and rotation
Animated swaying grass and light rays for a natural aquarium feel
Bubbles and particle effects to enhance visual immersion
Live stats showing number of fish, food, and score
Fully responsive and works on mobile devices
